com.mapbox.mapboxsdk.maps

Interface MapboxMap.OnPolygonClickListener

  • Enclosing class:
    MapboxMap
    Deprecated. 
    As of 7.0.0, use Mapbox Annotation Plugin instead

    @Deprecated
public static interface MapboxMap.OnPolygonClickListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the user clicks on a polygon.
    See Also:
    MapboxMap.setOnPolygonClickListener(OnPolygonClickListener)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPolygonClick(Polygon polygon)
      Deprecated. 
      Called when the user clicks on a polygon.

      • onPolygonClick

                    Polygon polygon)
        Deprecated. 
        Called when the user clicks on a polygon.
        Parameters:
        polygon - The polygon the user clicked on.
